meanings.definition: A person who writes rhymes, especially in a skillful or professional manner.
meanings.sent1: The talented rhymesters crafted beautiful poems.
meanings.sent2: Many famous rappers are skilled rhymesters.
meanings.sent3: The rhymesters at the poetry slam impressed the audience with their clever verses.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, rhymesters are like painters with words.
meanings.sent5: The young poet aspired to become a renowned rhymester one day.

meanings.sent1: The group of rhymesters gathered to share their latest works.
meanings.sent2: At the poetry club, the rhymesters discussed their favorite writing techniques.
meanings.sent3: During the poetry competition, the rhymesters cheered each other on enthusiastically.
meanings.sent4: The rhymesters' words danced together like a symphony of language.
meanings.sent5: In the park, a flock of rhymesters brainstormed new verses under the trees.
